title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not being persisted between sessions. This means that when the application is closed and reopened, the files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu MRU list.
OB: When the application is closed and reopened, the files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu MRU list.
EB: The files that were previously opened should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu MRU list when the application is reopened.
SR:
1. Open the application and open a few files.
2. Close the application.
3. Reopen the application.
4. Check the File menu MRU list and observe if the previously opened files are present.
